com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.layeredvideo

Interface PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity
    Enclosing class:
    PlaybackControlLayer

    public static interface PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback
    In order to imbue the PlaybackControlLayer with the ability make the player fullscreen, a PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback must be assigned to it. The PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback implementation is responsible for hiding/showing the other views on the screen when the player enters/leaves fullscreen mode.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onGoToFullscreen()
      When triggered, the activity should hide any additional views.
      void onReturnFromFullscreen()
      When triggered, the activity should show any views that were hidden when the player went to fullscreen.

    • Method Detail

      • onGoToFullscreen

        void onGoToFullscreen()
        When triggered, the activity should hide any additional views.

      • onReturnFromFullscreen

        void onReturnFromFullscreen()
        When triggered, the activity should show any views that were hidden when the player went to fullscreen.
